structure.unit: Chapter 33C FIXED-GUIDEWAY RAPID TRANSIT SYSTEM—DEVELOPMENT ZONE

text.section:
Sec. 33C-5. Guideway Aesthetic Zone.
The Guideway Aesthetic Zone consists of those land areas designated by the Board of County Commissioners which are adjacent to or within the Rapid Transit Developmental Impact Zone. Said lands [include those land areas which] are within the line of sight of the Rapid Transit System fixed guideways and stations and upon which land developments and/or structures (specifically including billboards) will deleteriously affect the aesthetic impact of the Rapid Transit System.
